naslov: Trogir, Čiovo, Vila s bazenom u blizini mora (prodaja)
opis: OKRUG GORNJI - drugi red uz more, u blizini lijepe šljunčane plaže Prekrasna novosagrađena, luksuzna vila s bazenom, brutto površine 290 m2 Vila se sastoji od: suterena, prizemlja i 1.kata, na parceli od 500 m2. SUTEREN: U suterenu se nalazi garaža površine 34 m2, u koju stanu 2 automobila, tehnička soba, strojarnica, zajednički prostor, soba i kupaonica. PRIZEMLJE: Na prizemlju je veliki dnevni boravak s blagovaonicom koji se zauzima prostor od 47 m2  + kuhinja 15 m2, te mali WC. Iz prizemlja se izlazi na veliku terasu i kultiviranu okućnicu, gdje se nalazi i vanjski bazen. 1.KAT: Na katu se nalaze 4 sobe, od čega 3 imaju balkon, sa kojeg se pruža pogled na more. Na katu se nalaze i dvije kupaonice. Luksuzno opremljena, po modernim standardima građena nekretnina, traži svoga vlasnika. Informacije o nekretnini kao i razgled iste moguć je isključivo uz potpis Ugovora o posredovanju u svrhu zaštite imovine vlasnika nekretnine od posjeta neregistriranih osoba, a u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Za sve informacije zvati na 091 937 3688 Ivana ili na email adresu i.fadic@remax.hr ******************************************************************* OKRUG GORNJI - second row by the sea, near a beautiful pebble beach Beautiful newly built, luxurious villa with pool, gross area 290 m2 The villa consists of: basement, ground floor and first floor, on a plot of 500 m2. BASEMENT: In the basement there is a garage of 34 m2, which can accommodate 2 cars, a technical room, an engine room, a common area, a room and a bathroom. GROUND FLOOR: On the ground floor there is a large living room with a dining room that occupies an area of 47 m2 + a kitchen of 15 m2, and a small toilet. The ground floor leads to a large terrace and cultivated garden, where there is also an outdoor pool. 1ST FLOOR: There are 4 rooms on the first floor, 3 of which have a balcony with a view of the sea. There are also two bathrooms on the first floor. A luxuriously equipped property, built according to modern standards, is looking for its owner. Information about the property as well as a viewing of it is possible only with the signature of the Agreement on mediation for the purpose of protecting the property of the owner of the property from visits by unregistered persons, and in accordance with the Law on Data Protection and the Law on Mediation in Real Estate Transactions. For all information, call Ivana on 091 937 3688 or email i.fadic@remax.hr
